content:
Use mail.twc.com on 993 for IMAP, SSL/TLS, normal password, email address; mail.twc.com on 587 for outgoing smtp, STARTTLS, normal password, email address. If the setup wizard gives something else, click manual config. and enter the above settings. 

https://www.spectrum.net/support/internet/mobile-email-setup
creator: sfhowes

content:
I am unfamiliar with that domain, but I did locate what may be the settings:

content: Click View>Layout and select Classic. Then select View>layout and select vertical and see if that restores the vertical view.
creator: davidsk
